sect2.title: Newsgroups Module
sect2.subtitle: Read and post to NNTP. Admin->Newsgroups.
sect2.para: The NewsGroups module provides the basic functionality to read and post to NNTP.

listitem.para: News server: Enter the name of the news server from which you wish to pull news. For example, "news.xaraya.com".
Port: Enter the port on the news server through which news will flow. Generally "119".
Topics per page: Enter the number of topics to display per page. If, for example, you wish to display 50 topics per page, enter "50" in this field.
